thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Tanya

author: Tanya
title: Tanya
text: I like using FlightHub to book my own flights and the option to book direct vs 1 stopover vs 2 stops and get really good pricing. The main problem I have is the significant time wasted because a) I can only request 1 day at a time instead of being able to compare pricing for 2 or more dates and b) if I compare 1-way to round trip options the screen keeps reverting back to previous data. For example, if I select 1-way for a specific date it takes a while for the screen to display info, only to result in the wrong flight details because it's displaying round trip details for a different date entered previously. Also, users have to be careful to avoid automatic extra charges by selecting NOT to have extra insurance and other options.
